title: What I can do
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Wh～at are you doing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Kyaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>….You didn’t even hear me opening the door, pretty focused aren’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I-, I was just spacing out<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then, what’s in that notebook? You looked like you were putting a lot of efforts on writing though~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s nothing impor-.... Hey Nozomi, at the shrine you’re helping at, would you get yelled at if you’re being loud?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh? What’s this all of the sudden? Well, it’s a bit separated from private residences, so if it’s a time where there’s not many people I think it’s fine to be a little loud….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm, is that so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What is it~? Tell me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Rin and Hanayo said that they wanted to have a vocal practice again…. So I thought I could at least help them find a spot<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>So what you wrote down in that notebook was for the vocal practice huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Haah!? I didn’t write anything like that though!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah yeah, Maki-chan, you’re a re~ally nice person huh. I’ll go ask for you. Is tomorrow fine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ah, thank god….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufufu~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wa-, I-, I didn’t mean it like that just now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Alright alright. It’s exactly as you said, Maki-chan~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
